name: sidebar-00
description: A three panel sidebar with navigation grouped by modules and command search.

files.content:
"use client" import { BadgeCheck, Bell, ChevronsUpDown, CreditCard, LogOut, Sparkles, } from "lucide-react" import { BellhopAvatar as Avatar, BellhopAvatarFallback as AvatarFallback, BellhopAvatarImage as AvatarImage, } from "@/registry/bellhop/ui/avatar" import { BellhopDropdownMenu as DropdownMenu, BellhopDropdownMenuContent as DropdownMenuContent, BellhopDropdownMenuGroup as DropdownMenuGroup, BellhopDropdownMenuItem as DropdownMenuItem, BellhopDropdownMenuLabel as DropdownMenuLabel, BellhopDropdownMenuSeparator as DropdownMenuSeparator, BellhopDropdownMenuTrigger as DropdownMenuTrigger, } from "@/registry/bellhop/ui/dropdown-menu" import { BellhopSidebarMenu as SidebarMenu, BellhopSidebarMenuButton as SidebarMenuButton, BellhopSidebarMenuItem as SidebarMenuItem, useBellhopSidebar as useSidebar, } from "@/registry/bellhop/ui/sidebar" export function NavUser({ user, }: { user: { name: string email: string avatar: string initials: string } }) { const { isMobile } = useSidebar() return ( {user.initials}
{user.name} {user.email}
{user.initials}
{user.name} {user.email}
Upgrade to Pro Account Billing Notifications Log out ) } // Bellhop namespaced export alias for v0.dev integration export const BellhopNavUser = NavUser

"use client" import * as React from "react" import { Calculator, Calendar, CreditCard, Search, Settings, Smile, User, } from "lucide-react" import { BellhopButton as Button } from "@/registry/bellhop/ui/button" import { BellhopCommandDialog as CommandDialog, BellhopCommandEmpty as CommandEmpty, BellhopCommandGroup as CommandGroup, BellhopCommandInput as CommandInput, BellhopCommandItem as CommandItem, BellhopCommandList as CommandList, BellhopCommandSeparator as CommandSeparator, BellhopCommandShortcut as CommandShortcut, } from "@/registry/bellhop/ui/command" import { BellhopSidebarHeader as SidebarHeader } from "@/registry/bellhop/ui/sidebar" export function SearchForm({ ...props }: React.ComponentProps<"form">) { const [open, setOpen] = React.useState(false) React.useEffect(() => { const down = (e: KeyboardEvent) => { if (e.key === "k" && (e.metaKey || e.ctrlKey)) { e.preventDefault() setOpen((open) => !open) } } document.addEventListener("keydown", down) return () => document.removeEventListener("keydown", down) }, []) return ( No results found. Calendar Search Emoji Calculator Profile ⌘P Billing ⌘B Settings ⌘S ) } // Bellhop namespaced export alias for v0.dev integration export const BellhopSearchForm = SearchForm
